entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Border container not resizing correctly when window restored down inside a flex layout #7427
  • Documentation for Multi-Project setup. #7426
  • [BUG] GA Fix Source Generation for when Adding new Maui Pages as still using old Stack Layout and not VerticalStackLayout #7424
  • Using #IF when targeting windows isn't working #7423
  • Contacts API namespace conflicts on MacCatalyst and iOS #7421
  • Processing Resources failed with error: Duplicate Entry after updating VS to version 17.3.0 Preview 1.1 #7420
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in Android shell when page becomes invisible #7417
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Maui RC3 + VS For Mac Rc2 + Android 31: Carousel stopped working. #7416
  • FlexLayout provides space for invisible children #7408

Closed

  • BlazorWebView: Uncaught SyntaxError: Identifier 'channel' has already been declared. #7392
    .NET 7
  • .NET 7 Preview 4 install breaks RC3 install experience #7422
  • The manifest package for 'ios' could not be found in any of the expected NuGet sources #7310
  • Image takes more space than needed if RequiredWidth is not set #5438
    6.0.300-servicing
  • CheckBox has default (empty) padding on Windows platform (Mac has no padding) #7352
    6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] Crash using ScrollTo with a grouped ListView #7145
  • ImageButton visual state does not reset #7073
  • Grid RowDefinition Height Binding not working #4609
    6.0.300-servicing
  • BlazorWebView on iOS uses APIs that require iOS 11 or newer #6078
    6.0.300
  • RTL is not working in AbsoluteLayout #6540
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] In multi-dimensional Column Grid, content aligned with VerticalOptions does not align unless its height is set. #2000
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Full Screen in Windows Platform #7378
  • [iOS] Build Action "SceneKitAsset" #7405
  • Provide a compiled version of FlexEnums and FlowDirection #6547
  • MainActivity's OnCreate throws System.IO.FileNotFoundException #7195
  • WinUI Touch keyboard does not open on Windows 10 (Tablet mode) #7361
  • FlyoutPage.IsPresented- not working in runtime #7398
  • Page is not transient when used as ShellContent #7329
  • Hot Restart (iOS) doesn't succeed with local device #7384
  • Adding more than 16 controls on a page makes the TAB order wrong in Windows. #7395

PullRequests

Created

  • Better handle disappearing content with ViewPager2 #7425
    area/shell 🐢
  • Revert "[Android] Fix crash removing items in ListView" #7418
    area/ListView
  • Fix swapping root page from Shell to Non Shell #7415
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fixed crash using Path in ControlTemplate ContentView #7412
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, fatal

Merged

  • Remove the padding around checkboxes #7379
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [Android] Fix crash removing items in ListView #7411
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, fatal, area/ListView
  • [Windows] Fix grouped ListView ScrollTo crash #7413
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, fatal, area/ListView
  • [Housekeeping] Added ImageButton sample using VisualStateManager #7296
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Ensure that Grid is propagating the BindingContext to the row/col definitions #7301
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix RTL in AbsoluteLayout #7309
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Allow the image handler to measure more accurately WRT aspect ratio #7389
  • [X] Add compiled converters #7245
    area/Xaml </>

Updated

  • Fix BlazorWebView disposal #7349
    area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge
  • Update to .NET 7 SDKs (Android only edition) #7375
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [X] simpilfy and avoid duplication in conversion #7143
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [Handlers] Make sure to update Content on handlers when the ControlTemplate changes #7235
    area/controls 🎮
